entity.name: Benjamin Netanyahu
entity.description: Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu

text:
@realDonaldTrump 6 months into the Covid-19 crisis, you admitted you didn't know what the 19 meant. It means 2019.
You thought Apple was run by Tim Apple.
You also called Kevin McCarthy, the head of your party "Steve".
You also thought the PM of Israel was named Netanyahu.
https://t.co/tP3dwmU5dR
